text: Casarotto is an Italian placename and Casarotti is an Italian surname. It can refer to: ==People with the surname== *Davide Casarotto (born 1971), former Italian cyclist *Ettore Casarotti (born 1911), Italian actor *Gino Casarotti, Italian comic publisher, founder of Editoriale Dardo *Giuseppe Casarotti, Italian comic publisher *Laura Casarotto (born 1969), Italian manager ==Places== ===Italy=== * Casarotto, Bergamo, village near Bergamo, Lombardy * Casarotto, Verona, village near Verona, Veneto Category:Italian-language surnames Category:Toponymic surnames
title: Casarotto
